location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government at Bombay to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter enclosing a copy of a petition from Pelamber Valloo to Sir Evan Nepean, Governor of Bombay, dated 9 May 1816, detailing an incident in which his ship was captured by Joasemee [Qasimi] pirates. His cargo was taken and some passengers injured.Warden instructs Bruce to command the next cruizer passing in the Gulf to demand reparation from the Joasemees.
